alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 08 at 8:29PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alameda County through 900 PM PST... At 829 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fairview, or near Dublin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...This cell has a history of producing pea size hail over San Lorenzo and could potentially produce more over the East Bay. There is a slight chance for locally erratic and brief heavier rains along with it. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hayward, Livermore, Pleasanton, Union City, Dublin and Sunol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys
